text:
[identifier] and consists of a twin placenta with two umbilical cord and attached membranes.

Extraplacental Membranes:
   Dividing Membrane:  [present/absent]
      Description:  [description]
      Intervening chorion:  [present/absent/indeterminate]
   Color:  [color]
   Amnion Nodosum:  [description]
   Cysts:  [description]
   Point of Rupture:  [description]

Umbilical Cord:
   Designations:
      Twin A:  [designation]
      Twin B:  [designation]
   Length:
      Twin A:  [length]
      Twin B:  [length]
   Insertion:
      Twin A:  [insertion]
      Twin B:  [insertion]
   Vessels:
      Twin A:  [number]
      Twin B:  [number]
   Knots:
      Twin A:  [description]
      Twin B:  [description]
   Coiling:
      Twin A:  [description]
      Twin B:  [description]

Placental Disc:
   Weight:  [weight] grams.
   Shape:  [shape]
   Measurements:  [measurement]
   Fetal Surface:
      Fetal Surface:  [description]
      Amnion Nodosum:  [description]
      Cysts:  [description]
   Maternal Surface:
      Hemorrhage:  [description]
         Adherent:  [measurement], [description]
         Non-Adherent:  [measurement]
      Maternal Surface:  [description]
      Surface Infarcts:  [description]
   Sectioned at 1 cm intervals:
       Infarcts:  [description]
       Cysts:  [description]

Cassette Summary: 
"1A" - Twin A umbilical cord and membranes, 
"1B" - "1D" - Twin A central placenta, 
"1E" -Twin B umbilical cord and membranes
"1F" - "1I" - Twin B central placenta
[?"1G" - Dividing membranes ?]
